title: Sterlite Power, GIC to form JV for developing, operating power transmission projects in India
description: Sterlite Power and GIC announce a joint venture to develop and operate power transmission projects in India. Sterlite Power will hold a majority 51% stake, with GIC owning 49%. With a focus on India's transmission sector, the venture aims to leverage a USD 13 billion bid pipeline, signaling confidence in India's growth vision.
